lead_paragraph: Anze Kopitar got the go-ahead goal on a power play late in the second period and defenseman Luke Schenn also scored for the Los Angeles Kings in a 2-1 victory over the Calgary Flames on Tuesday night.

headline.print_headline: Anze Kopitar's Go-Ahead Goal Helps Kings Beat Flames 2-1
headline.main: Anze Kopitar's Go-Ahead Goal Helps Kings Beat Flames 2-1
